body:
If using macro as suggested, Linux test seems to still give this error:
```
======================================================================
ERROR: test_from_numpy (__main__.TestTorch)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_torch.py", line 4935, in test_from_numpy
    tensor_from_array = torch.from_numpy(array)
TypeError: can't convert np.ndarray of type numpy.int64. The only supported types are: double, float, float16, int64, int32, and uint8.

----------------------------------------------------------------------
```
